_comment: This file is auto-generated from system.xml. It can be modified or replaced with API responses.

groups.label: API settings
groups.comment: Go to the general settings in the back office of MyParcel to generate the API Key.

fields.label: API key
fields.tooltip: The API Key

fields.label: Import MyParcel Backoffice settings
fields.tooltip: Clicking this button will fetch settings from the MyParcel Backoffice and overwrite the current settings.

fields.label: Use Free Shipping
fields.tooltip: Whether the MyParcel delivery costs are 0 when the Free Shipping delivery method is available.

fields.label: Show delivery date
fields.tooltip: Show a delivery date in the checkout.

fields.label: Number of days
fields.tooltip: Amount of days in the future customers can choose from in the checkout.

fields.label: Drop-off delay
fields.tooltip: This options allows you to set the number of days it takes you to pick, pack and hand in your parcels when ordered before the cutoff time.

fields.label: Mode
fields.tooltip: With 'Export entire order', MyParcel will export every order in its entirety to the back office for further processing.

fields.label: Paper type
fields.tooltip: Select a standard orientation for printing labels.

fields.label: Label description
fields.tooltip: This description will appear on the shipment label. The following parts can be used: %order_nr%, %delivery_date%, %product_id%, %product_name%, %product_qty%.

fields.label: Country of origin
fields.tooltip: This country will appear on the international consignment labels. This is where your products are shipped from. You can use NL, BE, DE etc. This will be overridden by country of manufacture on product level.

fields.label: Create Concept
fields.tooltip: Enable create label concept, when invoice is printed.

fields.label: I use the following weight type
fields.tooltip: This is the type of weight that I use with my products.

groups.label: Empty package weight
groups.comment: Fill in weight in grams, regardless of ‘weight type’ settings. This weight is added to the order weight. Exception: digital stamp will use the range class exactly when specified.

fields.label: Show details in summary
fields.tooltip: Where the shipping method is displayed, show the currently known details (yes) or the method title (no).

fields.label: Preferred pickup locations view
fields.tooltip: When pickup locations are enabled, the user can choose between map or list view. This setting decides which option will be selected first, upon opening the pickup locations.

fields.label: Price shown in delivery options
fields.tooltip:
This determines the way the price of delivery is shown to the customer through the delivery options.
                    The price can be shown as a total for each delivery option or as a surchage on top of the regular shipping price.

fields.label: Exclude parcel lockers
fields.tooltip: When enabled, parcel lockers will be excluded from pickup locations for all products. Only physical pickup points will be shown.

fields.label: Standard delivery Title
fields.tooltip: The times will be visible when nothing is filled in

fields.label: Home address only title
fields.tooltip: The times will be visible when nothing is filled in

fields.label: Morning title
fields.tooltip: The times will be visible when nothing is filled in

fields.label: Evening title
fields.tooltip: The times will be visible when nothing is filled in

fields.label: Monday delivery
fields.tooltip: Delivery on monday may require special conditions compared to other (week)days including but not limited to fee and cutoff time.

fields.label: Monday delivery fee
fields.tooltip: This will be added to the regular shipping price

fields.label: Signature on receipt fee
fields.tooltip: This will be added to the regular shipping price

fields.label: Receipt code fee
fields.tooltip: This will be added to the regular shipping price

fields.label: Home address only fee
fields.tooltip: This will be added to the regular shipping price

groups.label: Drop-off days
groups.comment: Specify the days you hand in your parcels for this carrier. Specify the latest time a customer can order for you to deliver the package in time for shipment that day.

fields.label: Monday
fields.tooltip: Whether you drop off packages on this day.

fields.label: Cut-off time
fields.tooltip: For orders before this time, the drop-off is considered done on this day.

fields.label: Tuesday
fields.tooltip: Whether you drop off packages on this day.

fields.label: Cut-off time
fields.tooltip: For orders before this time, the drop-off is considered done on this day.

fields.label: Wednesday
fields.tooltip: Whether you drop off packages on this day.

fields.label: Cut-off time
fields.tooltip: For orders before this time, the drop-off is considered done on this day.

fields.label: Thursday
fields.tooltip: Whether you drop off packages on this day.

fields.label: Cut-off time
fields.tooltip: For orders before this time, the drop-off is considered done on this day.

fields.label: Friday
fields.tooltip: Whether you drop off packages on this day.

fields.label: Cut-off time
fields.tooltip: For orders before this time, the drop-off is considered done on this day.

fields.label: Saturday
fields.tooltip: Whether you drop off packages on this day.

fields.label: Cut-off time
fields.tooltip: For orders before this time, the drop-off is considered done on this day.

fields.label: Sunday
fields.tooltip: Whether you drop off packages on this day.

fields.label: Cut-off time
fields.tooltip: For orders before this time, the drop-off is considered done on this day.

groups.label: Default shipping options
groups.comment: Fill in your preferences for a shipment. These settings will only apply for the mass actions in the order grid. When creating a single shipment, these settings can be changed manually. These settings will activate based on the order total amount.

fields.label: From price
fields.tooltip: 'Signature on receipt' operates above a certain order total amount

fields.label: From price
fields.tooltip: 'Home address only' operates above a certain order total amount

fields.label: From price
fields.tooltip: 'Return if no answer' operates above a certain order total amount

fields.label: From price
fields.tooltip: 'Large format' operates above a certain order total amount

fields.label: Automate 'Age check 18+'
fields.tooltip: The age check is intended for parcel shipments for which the recipient must show 18+ by means of a proof of identity. With this shipping option Signature on receipt and Home address only are included. The age 18+ is further excluded from the delivery options morning and evening delivery.

fields.label: Insure orders from (€)
fields.tooltip: The minimum amount from when insurance is active.

fields.label: Insure orders up to
fields.tooltip: This setting applies to domestic shipments only

fields.label: Insure orders up to (BE)
fields.tooltip: A custom be insurance price within a range of possibilities.

fields.label: Insure orders up to (EU)
fields.tooltip: A custom eu insurance price within a range of possibilities.

fields.label: Insure orders up to (ROW)
fields.tooltip: A custom row insurance price within a range of possibilities.

fields.label: Insure orders for percentage
fields.tooltip: Use percentage of total order amount for insurance. After the calculation, the next available price scale is selected.

fields.label: Automate digital stamp
fields.tooltip: Select automatically digital stamp packages based on weight

fields.label: Default weight
fields.tooltip: Price depends on the weight. Are the weights correctly filled in for all products? Choose 'No standard weight' to let MyParcel calculate the weight itself. Select a standard weight here when the products do not contain correct weights.

fields.label: Automate mailbox
fields.tooltip: Select automatically mailbox packages based on weight or volume

fields.label: Mailbox weight
fields.tooltip: To use this optimally, set a weight or 'Fit in mailbox' volume of each product. Regardless, shipments heavier than the weight specified here will not be mailbox.

fields.label: International mailbox
fields.tooltip: Only available for certain contracts. If this is not in your contract, the setting has no effect.

fields.label: Automate Small Package
fields.tooltip: Automatically select package type 'Small Package' for orders under 2000 grams. Package type will be 'Small Package' when a product has setting 'Fit in mailbox' set to 0 and the weight is under 2000 grams.

fields.label: Small Package weight
fields.tooltip: Shipments heavier than the weight specified here will not be of package type 'Small Package'.

fields.label: Morning delivery active
fields.tooltip: If age check is active then the morning delivery is not possible

fields.label: Morning delivery fee
fields.tooltip: This will be added to the regular shipping price

fields.label: Evening delivery active
fields.tooltip: If age check is active then the evening delivery is not possible

fields.label: Evening delivery fee
fields.tooltip: This will be added to the regular shipping price

fields.label: Pickup fee
fields.tooltip: Enter an amount that is either positive or negative. For example, do you want to give a discount for using this function or do you want to charge extra for this delivery option.

fields.label: Signature on receipt fee
fields.tooltip: This will be added to the regular shipping price

fields.label: Home address only fee
fields.tooltip: This will be added to the regular shipping price

fields.label: Automate 'Hide sender'
fields.tooltip: Activating the 'hide sender' option will remove the name and address of the sender from the label
